editorialNotes.standard: With exciting events, famous characters, and wild courses, Nintendo’s legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

name: Need for Speed No Limits Game

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Race and drive uphill to win!

editorialNotes.short: It's time to take your team to the top 🏎 🏁
editorialNotes.tagline: Take your team to the top
Put the pedal to the metal
editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever—and you won’t believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.
editorialNotes.short: Hit top speed and don't look back.

ios.subtitle: Drift fast to beat all rivals!
Join the guys in a crazy race!
